10001.name: 2x Die
10001.prop_description: Um... It means it's a die you can roll twice.

10002.name: Perfect Die
10002.use_description: You can specify the number you need.
10002.prop_description: It's a die that results in the number you want upon roll.

10003.name: Magician's Top Hat
10003.use_description:
You gain the Moneymaker status for 2 rounds.

Moneymaker: Get 1 Duckie Coin for every step moved.
10003.prop_description: Magicians performing at the plaza usually place a top hat in front of them. It's a signal to the audience to do the polite and necessary.

10004.name: Oceanstar Park Entry Ticket
10004.use_description:
You gain the Invincible status for 3 rounds.

Invincible: Coming into contact with the little yellow ducky will destroy it and give you 5 Duckie Coins.
10004.prop_description: To have this to be the Big Kahuna here.

10005.name: Ducky Hunting Gun
10005.use_description: Can destroy any duck on the board.
10005.prop_description: The best tool with which to really punish those troublemaking ducks.

10006.name: Mysterious Controller
10006.use_description:
You can choose to switch positions with any ducky on the board.

Position switch does not trigger terrain effects.
10006.prop_description: Emits a piece of audio that sends duckies into a state of confusion.

10007.name: Wear Sunscreen
10007.use_description:
You gain the Protected status.

Protected: Coming into contact with the little yellow ducky will destroy it and give you 5 Duckie Coins. Status expires upon occurrence.
10007.prop_description: The first rule of beach-going: "If I could offer you only one tip for the future, sunscreen would be it."

10008.name: Just An Ordinary Obstacle
10008.use_description: You can choose to place an obstacle anywhere that isn't occupied by an item or character.
10008.prop_description: Just an ordinary obstacle that's in everyone's way.

10009.name: Exploding Balloon
10009.use_description: You can choose to place an exploding balloon anywhere that isn't occupied by an item or character.
10009.prop_description: A balloon shaped like a bomb. Pro tip: Do not light the string on the balloon with a flame, for it WILL explode!

10010.name: The Pain of the Working Man
10010.use_description: You can choose any ducky or character. You can only roll 1s each time for 2 rounds.
10010.prop_description: Is that what hurts, the weight of the pack on his back? No, it's the pain of having to pay attention to one's work even when they're on vacation.

10011.name: Master Repair Technician
10011.use_description: Dismantles the selected item on the field, or removes an effect on you.
10011.prop_description: "How can I fix it if I can't take it apart? Please, relax. I know what I'm doing."

10012.name: Voice Control Ducky Horn
10012.use_description: All duckies on the map stop moving for 3 rounds.
10012.prop_description: Listen to me! All units on the field, look to me! Wooden figure no. 321, you are not to speak or move!
